data.value: Create a team to cooperate with your friends and other players. Set requirements to the vehicles.

data.name: window/intro/description
data.value: Participants are peer teams with 7 players each. Vehicles are limited to Tiers VI–VIII. The total Tier of vehicles on a team must be 54.

data.value: Select a suitable team from the list of existing ones. You must meet the Commander's requirements.
